name: Canon EOS Rebel T5i Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM & 75-300mm III Lens + 32GB Card + Battery + Case + Flash + Tele/Wide Lenses + Tripod Kit

reviews.name: Canon EOS Rebel T5i Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM & 75-300mm III Lens + 32GB Card + Battery + Case + Flash + Tele/Wide Lenses + Tripod Kit
reviews.reviewText: I just love my new Canon t5i. Everything arrived on time and in great condition. I would highly recommended ordering from this company.
reviews.title: Awesome package and camera

reviews.name: Canon EOS Rebel T5i Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM & 75-300mm III Lens + 32GB Card + Battery + Case + Flash + Tele/Wide Lenses + Tripod Kit
reviews.reviewText:
Very good price for an awesome
bundle. The camera itself is an amazing source for photograohy, but add in a tripod and a secondary lense, and you are all set for professional shots.
reviews.title: Photograohy at its finest

reviews.name: Canon EOS Rebel T5i Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM & 75-300mm III Lens + 32GB Card + Battery + Case + Flash + Tele/Wide Lenses + Tripod Kit
reviews.reviewText: The camera is amazing. All the reviews are spot on.
reviews.title: Canon T5i
